heading: This Afternoon
text: Scattered snow showers nortgh, numerous in the mountains.
temperature: Falling through the 20s south, into the teens north

heading: Tonight
text: Scattered snow showers north, numerous in the mountains.

heading: Friday
temperature: Upper teens to mid 20s, except mid to upper 20s far southern valleys

heading: Saturday
text: Chance of afternoon snow showers, mainly west.
